article_title: 100 days since unthinkable attack triggered devastating war
sentence: At  least  1,200  people  were  killed  along  the  length  of  the  border  as  Israeli  defences  were  caught  completely  by  surprise.

article_title: 100 days since unthinkable attack triggered devastating war
sentence: More  than  360  people  were  killed  at  the  festival  site  and  dozens  more  abducted  to  Gaza.

article_title: 100 days since unthinkable attack triggered devastating war
sentence: The  number  of  civilians  killed  in  the  Israeli  bombardment  that  followed  the  Hamas  attacks  has  been  huge.

sentence: More  than  23,000  have  been  killed,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry,  many  of  them  women  and  children.

sentence: But  the  number  of  civilians  killed  in  the  Israeli  bombardment  has  been  enormous.
